channel.title: Comments on: Get Your Updates! Who Needs One?

item.title: By: Foton of AFKGamer
item.dc:creator: Foton of AFKGamer
item.description: Not to be immodest, but I have seen <em>All the President's Men</em> a few times. So I do know quite a bit about professional journalism.
item.content:encoded: Not to be immodest, but I have seen All the President’s Men a few times. So I do know quite a bit about professional journalism.

item.title: By: wjp3
item.dc:creator: wjp3
item.description:
I'm impressed with your investigative journalism. I'm also impressed with Blizzard's actions towards cheating/TOS violations/etc. I get the feeling that Bliz is working towards a big smackdown behind the scenes. Hopefully, at least.
*Great* site!
item.content:encoded:
I’m impressed with your investigative journalism. I’m also impressed with Blizzard’s actions towards cheating/TOS violations/etc. I get the feeling that Bliz is working towards a big smackdown behind the scenes. Hopefully, at least.

*Great* site!
